name: Blender MCP
description: AI-powered 3D modeling and scene control in Blender with voice commands, rich context, and multi-step operations
author: Blender MCP Contributors

tools.name: get_full_context
tools.description: Get complete Blender context including active editor, viewport state, selection, scene settings, objects, and materials

tools.name: get_scene_info
tools.description: Get comprehensive Blender scene information including all objects, selection state, materials, cameras, lights, and modifiers

tools.name: get_object_info
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific object including mesh data, modifiers, materials, and transforms

tools.name: get_viewport_state
tools.description: Get current viewport settings including shading mode, overlays, camera view, and 3D cursor position

tools.name: get_viewport_screenshot
tools.description: Capture a screenshot of the current Blender viewport

tools.name: get_node_tree
tools.description: Get detailed node tree structure from a material or geometry nodes, including all nodes, values, and connections

tools.name: get_modifier_stack
tools.description: Get the complete modifier stack for an object with all settings and values

tools.name: execute_blender_code
tools.description: Execute Python code in Blender - create objects, modify materials, set up lighting, or any Blender operation

tools.name: switch_editor
tools.description: Switch the active editor type in Blender (e.g., to node editor, properties, timeline)

tools.name: set_viewport_shading
tools.description: Change viewport shading mode (wireframe, solid, material preview, rendered)

tools.name: set_view_angle
tools.description: Set the viewport camera angle (top, front, side, camera view)

tools.name: create_material
tools.description: Create a new material with principled BSDF shader and optionally assign it to the active object

tools.name: add_node
tools.description: Add a node to a material's shader node tree

tools.name: remove_node
tools.description: Remove a node from a material's shader node tree

tools.name: set_node_value
tools.description: Set an input value on a shader node (e.g., color, roughness, strength)

tools.name: connect_nodes
tools.description: Connect two nodes in a material's shader node tree

tools.name: disconnect_node
tools.description: Disconnect a node's socket from its connections

tools.name: add_modifier
tools.description: Add a modifier to an object (e.g., SUBSURF, BEVEL, ARRAY, MIRROR, BOOLEAN)

tools.name: remove_modifier
tools.description: Remove a modifier from an object

tools.name: apply_modifier
tools.description: Apply a modifier to permanently bake its effect into the mesh

tools.name: set_modifier_settings
tools.description: Update settings on an existing modifier

tools.name: select_object
tools.description: Select an object in the scene

tools.name: set_mode
tools.description: Set the interaction mode (Object, Edit, Sculpt, etc.)

tools.name: add_primitive
tools.description: Add a primitive mesh object (cube, sphere, cylinder, etc.)

tools.name: transform_object
tools.description: Transform an object's location, rotation, or scale

tools.name: delete_object
tools.description: Delete an object from the scene

tools.name: set_texture
tools.description: Set or create a texture for a material

tools.name: set_frame
tools.description: Set the current frame in the timeline

tools.name: set_frame_range
tools.description: Set the animation frame range

tools.name: insert_keyframe
tools.description: Insert a keyframe for an object property

tools.name: delete_keyframe
tools.description: Delete a keyframe from an object property

tools.name: execute_action_sequence
tools.description: Execute multiple actions in sequence atomically for multi-step operations

tools.name: get_polyhaven_status
tools.description: Check if Poly Haven integration is available

tools.name: get_polyhaven_categories
tools.description: Get available categories from Poly Haven asset library

tools.name: search_polyhaven_assets
tools.description: Search for assets on Poly Haven (HDRIs, textures, models)

tools.name: download_polyhaven_asset
tools.description: Download and import an asset from Poly Haven

tools.name: get_sketchfab_status
tools.description: Check if Sketchfab integration is available

tools.name: search_sketchfab_models
tools.description: Search for 3D models on Sketchfab

tools.name: download_sketchfab_model
tools.description: Download and import a model from Sketchfab

tools.name: get_hyper3d_status
tools.description: Check if Hyper3D/Rodin integration is available

tools.name: generate_hyper3d_model_via_text
tools.description: Generate a 3D model from text description using Hyper3D Rodin

tools.name: generate_hyper3d_model_via_images
tools.description: Generate a 3D model from reference images using Hyper3D Rodin

tools.name: poll_rodin_job_status
tools.description: Check the status of a Rodin generation job

tools.name: import_generated_asset
tools.description: Import a generated 3D asset from Rodin into Blender

tools.name: get_hunyuan3d_status
tools.description: Check if Hunyuan3D integration is available

tools.name: generate_hunyuan3d_model
tools.description: Generate a 3D model using Hunyuan3D

tools.name: poll_hunyuan_job_status
tools.description: Check the status of a Hunyuan3D generation job

tools.name: import_generated_asset_hunyuan
tools.description: Import a generated 3D asset from Hunyuan3D into Blender
